name: Microsoft Word HTML Document
summary: Learn about .DOCHTML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Word no longer supports the DOCHTML format. Instead of saving documents as DOCHTML files, you can now save them as .MHTML and .MHT files, which are more widely supported.

To create a webpage version of your document in Word 365, select File â†’ Save As, then choose the "Single File Web Page (*.mht, *.mhtml)" option from the dropdown menu. You can also choose to save your document as an .HTM or .HTML file.

description: A DOCHTML file is the HTML format of a document generated with Microsoft Word. It is the HTML version of the document created that can be used for publishing to web server. DOCHTML files can be opened in web browser for viewing the contents of the converted word document. The outlook and appearence of the DOCHTML file is same as that of the original Word document.

A DOCHTML file is an HTML version of a document created with Microsoft Word, a word processing productivity application. It contains HTML source code that displays the document in a format similar to the original .DOC file. DOCHTML files are typically used for publishing and viewing document contents in a web browser.

instructions: Unfortunately, there are no known applications that fully support the DOCHTML format since Microsoft Word dropped support for it.
